Formatted Document Test

Introduction to Formatting

This document contains various types of formatting to test the conversion service's ability to preserve formatting when converting between PDF and DOCX.

Text Styling

Here are some examples of text styling:

  • Bold text should be preserved
  • Italic text should be preserved
  • Underlined text should be preserved
  • Colored text should be preserved if possible
  • Text with highlighting should be preserved if possible

Blockquote

Conclusion

This document tests the formatting preservation capabilities of the conversion service. The goal is to maintain as much of the original formatting as possible when converting between PDF and DOCX formats.
